description:
The Student Council`s prom plans sour after a shocking school policy reversal — and to make matters worse, an unexpectedly familiar messenger delivers the bad news.
Source: HIDIVE

titles.title: By Chance, Yui Yuigahama Thinks of the Future.
Futo, Yuigahama Yui wa Mirai no Omoi o Haseru.
Soudain, Yui Yuigahama songe à l`avenir
يوي يويغهاما، فجأةً، أمعني النظر في المستقبل
ふと, 由比ヶ浜結衣は未来に思いを馳せる.
